price: Ìyẹn nítorí pé (àwọn aláìsàn ọkàn) ń sọ fún àwọn tó kórira ohun tí Allāhu sọ̀kalẹ̀ (ìyẹn àwọn yẹhudi) pé: “Àwa yóò tẹ̀lé yin nínú apá kan ọ̀rọ̀ náà.”¹ Allāhu sì mọ àṣírí wọn.
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُمۡ قَالُواْ لِلَّذِينَ كَرِهُواْ مَا نَزَّلَ ٱللَّهُ سَنُطِيعُكُمۡ فِي بَعۡضِ ٱلۡأَمۡرِۖ وَٱللَّهُ يَعۡلَمُ إِسۡرَارَهُمۡ
footnotes: 1. Ìyẹn ni pé, àwọn aláìsàn ọkàn nínú àwọn mùsùlùmí, ìyẹn àwọn tí wọn ń sá fún ogun ẹ̀sìn, wọ́n lọ bá àwọn yẹhudi, ìyẹn àwọn tí wọ́n kírira pé Ànábì ìkẹ́yìn dìde láààrin àwọn ọmọ Ànábì ’Ismā‘īl. Igun alágàbàǹgebè sì ń sàdéhùn àtìlẹ́yìn fún igun yẹhudi.

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: dhālika bi-annahum qālū lilladhīna karihū mā nazzala al-lahu sanuṭīʿukum fī baʿḍi al-amri wal-lahu yaʿlamu is'rārahum
